duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct supervision of the clinical financial operations and management of the Medical Practice Income Plan (MPIP)
Strategic financial planning, budgeting, and policy implementation in compliance with regulatory requirements
Oversight of business closing processes, financial statement preparation, and reporting
Collaboration with executive leadership and stakeholders to secure meaningful benchmarks for financial planning and reporting
Development and implementation of financial and internal control policies and processes
Engagement in vendor contract development, negotiation, and monitoring

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business, finance, or accounting (Master's preferred)
